info.title: Cloudflare Bypass API
info.description: An API service that helps bypass Cloudflare protection and retrieve cookies and HTML content from protected websites.

get.description: Bypasses Cloudflare protection and returns the cookies and user agent needed for future requests.

parameters.name: url

schema.description: The URL of the Cloudflare-protected website
schema.title: Url

parameters.description: The URL of the Cloudflare-protected website

parameters.name: retries

schema.description: Number of retry attempts for bypassing Cloudflare
schema.title: Retries

parameters.description: Number of retry attempts for bypassing Cloudflare

200.description: Returns a dictionary of cookies and the user agent string

get.description: Bypasses Cloudflare protection and returns the full HTML content along with cookies and user agent in headers

parameters.name: url

schema.description: The URL of the Cloudflare-protected website
schema.title: Url

parameters.description: The URL of the Cloudflare-protected website

parameters.name: retries

schema.description: Number of retry attempts for bypassing Cloudflare
schema.title: Retries

parameters.description: Number of retry attempts for bypassing Cloudflare

200.description: Returns HTML content with cookies and user agent in response headers
